page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content: There are four churches in our block, at Kittisford, Stawley, Ashbrittle and Greenham. They are all Church of England. Very few people go to regular services now. Only one child in our school goes to church every Sunday and he lives in Wellington which, of course, is outside our block. At Appley there used to be a chapel but it has been turned into a private house. The four churches in our block have to share one rector, so he is kept very busy. He also comes to Stawley Primary School every Monday morning to join in our morning assembly.
